## ControlComponent.viewOptionSelectors property

Selectors for viewOptions values. Use with [FormStateResolver](./dynamic-forms.formstateresolver.md) to retrieve observable values.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
viewOptionSelectors: Immutable<AllowFormStateSelectors<TViewOptions, any, any>>;
```
